mapper.select:
select m.fid as id, m.fnumber as num ,m.fname_l2 as title,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber ,m.FAMOUNT as amount,m.FBALANCE as balance from T_CON_ProgrammingContract m left join T_CON_Programming e on e.fid=m.FProgrammingID
m.fcontracttypeid=#{contractTypeId} and e.FProjectID=#{projectId} and e.FIsLatest=1
order by m.flongnumber
